version_description: General backend improvements

- New Pops! and Event content
- New event type
- General optimization and stability improvements
- Bug fixing

General stability improvements

New Funko Pops! and exciting events kick off every week!

Happy Holidays from the Funko Team! This update adds:

- A new Legendary Holiday Collection with an exclusive Candy Cane Freddy Funko reward for completing.
- A fix for T-Bone’s Super
- A fix for being logged out unexpectedly
- Memory optimizations and additional performance improvements.

Happy Playing!

New Funko Pops! and exciting events kick off every week

General Stability Improvements
Bug Fixing

Happy New Year from the Funko Team! This update contains:

A fix for random crashes while using a Pop!'s Super
A fix for unexpected disconnections
Additional game stability improvements

Check the game every Wednesday for new Funko Pops! and events.

Greetings from the Funko team! This update contains:

More work to smash the Supers bug
Game stability
Smaller app size

Check back every Wednesday for new Funkp Pops! and events! Thank you for playing.

Greetings Funko Pop! Blitz players!

This update adds support for additional special characters and fixes an issue with coins that some players recently experienced.

Check back every Wednesday to see what’s new.

Hello Funko Pop! Blitz players!

This update gives you the ability to opt in or out of IDFA tracking. This helps us to better serve you ads. You can watch ads to earn extra lives or for extra spins on the prize wheel.

Check back every Wednesday for new Pops! and events.

Introducing Mega Collections!

Now you can earn even more rewards for collecting Pops! Collect all the Pops! from 4 events in a row and win an ultra powerful 7-star Mythic Pop! Unlock Coin Bonuses along the way to earn more coins for every round you play.

New events kick off every Wednesday, featuring all new Pops!

New events kick off every Wednesday, featuring all new Pops!
